thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 4 of 65
thread.title: Nechelle

author: Nechelle
title: Nechelle
text: We have had a great experience thus far in booking our trip. We had alot of questions that were all answered immediately and booking the trip was easy. We were able to fly out from the location we selected and secured non-stop flights which was very important. The price is very good for the destination and Roman our booking agent was awesome. We are looking forward to vacation, a great trip and making memories. I would definitely use Blue Sun again. Thanks again for your assistance in what we know will be a great time!
